channel.title: Trouble logging on
channel.description:
k when i try to log on its says that the account is already logged on. so i tride a difrerent account same thing heres what the starter looked like
Client type: low memory version UserId: 20008744 santa is signing onto server. [client-8-santa]: santa is already online. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1350 Client type: low memory version UserId: 15268205 javis is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1351 Client type: low memory version UserId: 15268205 javis is signing onto server. [client-10-javis]: javis is already online. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1352 Client type: low memory version UserId: 15268205 javis is signing onto server. [client-11-javis]: javis is already online. ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1353 Client type: low memory version UserId: 15268205 javis is signing onto server. [client-12-javis]: javis is already online.
plz help

item.title: Trouble logging on
item.dc:creator: @danny_rfc danny_rfc
item.description:
@danny_rfc wrote:

lol that happend to me lemme try think what i done :-s[br][size=1]Posted on: January 22, 2007, 03:05:15 PM[/size][hr]o i think u need to edit ur runserver.bat to
@echo off
title Runserver
set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Trouble logging on
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

k i tried again it first itll log on to the black screen part then itll loose connection and then i cant log on again cuz it says acc is already logged on here is what the starter looks like now from the begining

Starting PhoneScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2
"
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)

at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1415)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:23)
at server.main(server.java:27)

item.description:

hmmm… maybe bobby is right, but it might just b busy and u cant get in, and if it says account is already made, u should restart ur client.
